title: Is this a ‘critical inflection point’ at the intersection of AI and work?
description: We haven’t come close to the ‘final version of AI’, if that even exists, so how might artificial intelligence reshape the workplace in 2026?Read more: Is this a ‘critical inflection point’ at the intersection of AI and work?

title: Yelp Agrees to Buy AI Agent Startup in $300 Million Deal
description: Yelp has agreed to acquire an AI agent startup for approximately $300 million, according to reporting. The deal marks one of Yelp’s largest acquisitions and reflects a broader shift toward automation and AI-driven consumer interactions. Yelp is making a significant bet on artificial intelligence. The company has agreed to buy an AI agent startup for [...]

title: This Indian AI Stock Just Won 3 Big Awards At A Global AI Summit; Here’s Why It Matters
description: One Point One Solutions Ltd. (1Point1), a well-known provider of AI-driven business process management (BPM) solutions, won three major honors at the Elets AI Summit 2026 in New Delhi: Customer Experience AI Solution, AI-Powered Analytics Solution, and AI Leader.

title: Infosys Expands Its Footprint in Switzerland with a New Zurich Office to Accelerate Enterprise AI Journeys
